description:
How we are developing and shipping Sentry both as an Open Source project and a SaaS solution. A look at our development methodology, technology stack and lessons learned from turning an Open Source project into a business.



Armin Ronacher is a Partner at Sentry. He's the creator and maintainer behind the Python based Flask microframework and Jinja2 template engine.
title: Shipping Sentry - Armin Ronacher at DevconTLV 10
